testcase.classname: Verify various operations on the home page
testcase.name: Verify that the 'Get fresh produce' button is clickable and relevant page should be visible
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the home page..........................................passed When the relevant Get fresh produce button should be clickable..............passed And the user clicks on the Get fresh produce link...........................passed Then the relevant Farmers Market page should be visible.....................passed
